html:
10.25.24  11:10 am   Are you cognizant of the fact that, the more facts you're cognizant of, the more cognizant you are about the fact that there are facts that you're not cognizant of?

      in this case, as i'm certain was your intention, all i can think about is the word 'cognizant'

10.25.24  10:14 am   do you like spaghetti?

      i like the way it's pronounced

10.25.24  7:44 am   do you prefer quotes like "this" or like 'this'

      the double seems too strong so i like to use singles, but the only problem is if i have apostrophes inside then it drives me crazy. so sometimes i opt for doubles when there happens to be an apostrophe in there, or else use singles but skip the apostrophes

10.25.24  4:39 am   what's your favorite school subject? mine is english

      mine is the schedule

10.24.24  11:20 pm   i read a bunch of negative reviews for a movie and now i'm sad even though i know it doesn't actually affect me. how do i let go and just let other people have opinions?

      speaking of which, maybe it's time for you to give the movie a great review

10.24.24  10:23 pm   what are your thoughts on eukaryotic supergroups?

      now i'm wondering what you'd call a group of those

10.24.24  8:49 pm   What is the best way to introduce somebody to your videos who has not yet ingested any of it

      there isn't a way

10.24.24  8:24 pm   In a nuanced world, does it mean anything to say that a thing is both good and bad when nothing is either purely good or purely bad to begin with?

      sure. maybe a reminder was needed

10.24.24  7:35 pm   do you think it's possible to start a new religion

      it's happened before

10.24.24  6:25 pm   Have you ever made the unfortunate mistake of breaking a pinkie promise

      no

10.24.24  3:53 pm   what should I write about?

      everything

10.24.24  1:38 pm   where is Old Holland?

      possibly around haarlem

10.24.24  12:34 pm   have you ever written non-functional harmony? (i.e. chord progressions that can't have numerals assigned to them because they don't lead to a resolution)

      i'm not following your logic here

10.24.24  11:13 am   hi bill, im a noob at piano but i wanted to know if thats enough to write songs? also im having trouble playing chords correctly.

      no one knows how to write songs like you. this is the reality in which you live at the moment you write a song. you can start feeling that way any time you're ready

10.24.24  11:04 am   Why is William Shakespeare considered the greatest writer in the English language?

      it's hard to find an answer to that until you figure out who you would consider to be the greatest

10.24.24  10:24 am   Why did you want theese questions in purple?

      to go with the yellow

10.24.24  9:33 am   If given a chance to consume space beans, would you do so?

      step 1, find out what the heck is a space bean

10.24.24  9:32 am   i want to add an aside to a sentence because i think it clarifies something but putting it in parentheses is too imposing. problem is, i can't think of a syntax block less imposing than parentheses. ideally, i'd make the aside in small text but i don't have that luxury. is there anything you'd recommend, syntactically?

      take inspiration from how you might phrase this in a real conversation. use some of those same devices to rewrite the section, sans parenthesis

10.24.24  8:31 am   why is learning a new language so hard, when learning our first language is seemingly innate?

      maybe you're just trying to learn a language in an impossible way. with your first language, however, you probably didn't do that. perhaps back then you didn't know the word 'impossible'

10.24.24  7:53 am   How's your mental state?

      grate

10.24.24  7:31 am   how do people in the land of two-letter words refer to the land of two-letter words if none of those words are two letters

      after enough time, they'd end up just calling it lando

10.24.24  6:55 am   What's your favorite multiple of 17?

      1003

10.24.24  5:59 am   I've leveraged my connections to make more connections which I've then leveraged and now I am in various positions of responsibility that honestly I think are beyond me. How can I gently let people know I'm not some kind of superhero? That I've just been at the right place at the right time?

      maybe you could actually become a super hero, on the side. in any case, people seem to think the place you are is the right place for a super hero. So, according to my calculations, if it were really the right place at the right time, then it would have to be the right time for you to be a superhero. in other words, that would make it the wrong place for you not to be a superhero. i'm an aspiring logician

10.24.24  3:11 am   Without sparing any details, how do I find my vocal range? I think I'm an alto, but I've been told I'm just an untrained soprano

      it doesn't seem like you're looking for a vocal range, it looks like you're looking for an italian name for yourself. in that case, how about cantantissimo

10.24.24  2:18 am   Are you planning to make more music with your old style of editing?

      i think the strongest thing my work resembles of my other work is the fact that i inevitably am me

10.24.24  2:06 am   What is your opinion?

      it's ok

10.24.24  1:40 am   i've been putting off listening to a particular song because it's supposed to be really really good

      that's fine. you'll find it when you need it

10.24.24  12:58 am   Will you help me fix the brain you broke

      sure

10.24.24  12:37 am   What's the difference between intellectual dishonesty and just plain old dishonesty?

      the level of intellectuality

10.23.24  11:28 pm   Do you have any more plans for skit-like videos, or is it mainly more songs/music videos? 

      i have 11 videos lined up that have incessant amounts of dialogue. music in them also sometimes. after that there will be more, plus more songs also

10.23.24  10:51 pm   what is your favorite multiple of 7?

      2401

10.23.24  10:31 pm   how the hell do i learn to sing if i'm already an adult? there are songs in my heart that i want to share with the world but i record myself and listen and i'm like oooh honey that's not a note...

      yeah just keep doing it. you can't not get better

10.23.24  8:29 pm   wdym poland spring isn't from a polish spring

      poland is in maine. might not even be from there, but that's where it's supposed to be from

10.23.24  7:04 pm   Do you ever type something and think about how you would never say that in real life

      not too often. my written language matches my spoken language pretty well

10.23.24  5:06 pm   How fast is the earth going

      1rpd

10.23.24  4:04 pm   are the lyrics for your songs on Spotify official (provided by you)?

      not unless they exactly match the lyrics on the lyrics page of this site

10.23.24  3:58 pm   could we see the scenes from the scenes for sale? they looked cool

      some of them are in "If the World Doesn't End"

10.23.24  2:58 pm   is checkers any good

      it's a little bit good

10.23.24  2:38 pm   what's the downside with going insane?

      if you go too insane it's not even crazy anymore. so that's kind of a drag

10.23.24  1:26 pm   Is it true that might quit's melody came from a dream?

      the first 8 bars yes

10.23.24  12:28 pm   Have I "signed into" my account or "signed in to" my account

      you've "discovered an ambiguity in the language"

10.23.24  9:34 am   i really like how you use the words and shapes in your videos. you always seem to find new ways to use them and it feels really cool

      how about some new ways to find new ways

10.23.24  9:22 am   can you make the world smaller?

      no

10.23.24  8:15 am   What's your favorite color?

      regular

10.23.24  6:26 am   Do you like bossa nova

      in principle yes

10.23.24  4:17 am   Why do so many people feel lonely even though they know almost everyone else feels lonely too? 

      perhaps they don't actually spend any time together

10.23.24  1:37 am   what is the most meaningful character you have created?

      i leave the meaning spectrum open. you can do the ranking, if you'd even dare to set such a thing in stone

10.23.24  12:58 am   im going to be rich and famous 

      i'll admit that's possible

10.22.24  11:31 pm   Thoughts on being asked for your thoughts on things you have no thoughts on?

      that's like picking up a heavy thing that you don't actually need to pick up

10.22.24  10:22 pm   have you read the whole bible?

      to be fair, there's a lot of different bibles
